Position 1, Tyler Kubena
========================

![Tyler Kubena](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=20700)
Tyler Kubena is a teacher, coach, and parent running for City Council â€“ Position 1. As an educator, he believes in learning, listening, and making informed decisions. He wants to support smart growth while preserving what makes Seabrook special. He focuses on strengthening the city for families by fostering a thriving community, encouraging responsible development, and ensuring decisions are grounded in facts and long-term sustainability. Tyler is committed to working with residents and leaders to make Seabrook an even better place to live, work, and raise a family.

### SEABROOK CITY HALL

1. 1700 1st St.
   Seabrook, TX 77586
   (281) 291-5600

   ### Tyler Kubena

   At-Large Position 1
